string-array.name: motivational_quotes
string-array.item: If people were possessed by reason, running marathons would not work. But we are not creatures of reason. We are creatures of passion. - Noel Carroll
If it doesn\'t challenge you, it won\'t change you. - Fred DeVito
Sometimes the best runs come on days you didn\'t feel like running.
With self-discipline all things are possible. - Theodore Roosevelt
Today I will do what others won\'t so tomorrow I can do what others can\'t.
Running is like coffee. I\'m much nicer after I\'ve had one.
Make each day your masterpiece. - John Wooden
